evidence.text: 3 | 2025-04-04 | MOTION for Preliminary and Permanent Injunction. Monica Tranel appearing for Plaintiffs Jonathan St. Goddard, Susan Webber.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs Jonathan St. Goddard and Susan Webber filed a motion for preliminary and permanent injunction on April 4, 2025, seeking court-ordered relief against Kristi Noem, the United States of America, U.S. Department of Homeland Security, and the U.S. Attorney General.

evidence.text: 18 | 2025-04-14 | MOTION to Transfer to U.S. Court of International Trade. Luke Mathers appearing for Defendants Kristi Noem, The United States of America, U.S. Department of Homeland Security.

extracted.value: Defendants Kristi Noem, the United States of America, and U.S. Department of Homeland Security filed a motion to transfer the case to the U.S. Court of International Trade on April 14, 2025, seeking jurisdictional transfer under 28 U.S.C. § 1631.

evidence.text: 20 | 2025-04-14 | MOTION to Stay Proceedings Pending Disposition of Defendants' Motion to Transfer. Luke Mathers appearing for Defendants Kristi Noem, The United States of America, U.S. Department of Homeland Security.

extracted.value: Defendants Kristi Noem, the United States of America, and U.S. Department of Homeland Security filed a motion to stay proceedings pending resolution of their transfer motion on April 14, 2025.

evidence.text: 31 | 2025-04-21 | MOTION to Intervene. Jesse Laslovich appearing for Interested Party Montana Farmers Union. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Complaint, # 2 Declaration of John Wicks, # 3 Declaration of Sarah Degn, # 4 Declaration of Trent Stoltz, # 5 Corporate Disclosure Statement)

extracted.value: Montana Farmers Union filed a motion to intervene on April 21, 2025, seeking to join the case as an interested party with supporting declarations.

evidence.text: 42 | 2025-04-25 | MOTION for Preliminary Injunction Pending Appeal. Monica Tranel appearing for Plaintiffs David Mountain Chief, Rhonda Mountain Chief, Jonathan St. Goddard, Susan Webber.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs David Mountain Chief, Rhonda Mountain Chief, Jonathan St. Goddard, and Susan Webber filed a motion for preliminary injunction pending appeal on April 25, 2025, following the transfer of the case to the U.S. Court of International Trade.

evidence.text: 45 | 2025-04-28 | MOTION for Reconsideration Final Order Doc. 40. Monica Tranel appearing for Plaintiffs David Mountain Chief, Rhonda Mountain Chief, Jonathan St. Goddard, Susan Webber.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs David Mountain Chief, Rhonda Mountain Chief, Jonathan St. Goddard, and Susan Webber filed a motion for reconsideration of the order denying their preliminary injunction motion on April 28, 2025.
